html:
7.5.22  2:59 pm     in your website there is a bench photo, and around 5 years later, you made a jingle about a bench, did the bench photo inspire the jingle?

     no, but it's possible the bench itself did

     or is it something else?

     it could have been another bench. the important thing was that i had seen a bench before. the bench object was part of my repertoire

7.5.22  2:39 pm   What's your favorite color?

      sepulveda

7.5.22  1:15 pm   what do you do for fun 

      goals

7.5.22  1:13 pm   How well do you handle praise

      good but it takes a long time to process it

7.5.22  10:10 am   How did you come up with such a good bass part for "I'm Scared"?

      it was originally gonna go around the chords every 2 bars, like ground plane. but then i changed it to go around every 1 bar. so, how many ways are there for the bass to get up and around, in 1 bar? i tried to pick one of the ways that hasn't been used before

7.5.22  9:56 am   Was the song "i'm a huge gamer most of the time" inspired by any certain video game?

      it was inspired by those gamer chairs

7.5.22  9:56 am   How do i stop being a douchebag?

      eventually you will get tired of it

7.5.22  8:50 am   Who plays all your characters in your videos? Do you?

      yes

7.5.22  6:17 am   how long is your next song 

      3:23

7.5.22  4:33 am   do you own any plants?

     no

     if yes, do they have names?

7.5.22  2:08 am   How to have fun

      that's easy, just stand on a chair

7.4.22  11:42 pm   whats your favorite part of your song: ''the ground plane''

      right around "when the plane gets too high, i don't like it" because when writing it that's probably just about the moment when it became a song and not just a title

7.4.22  10:16 pm   hi bill would you consider your brain a disorganized mess

      no

7.4.22  8:25 pm   How do you come up with your ideas

      there is no way. ideas are wayless

7.4.22  6:59 pm   can you leak the title of a song that definitely isn't getting recorded

      i want to record all of them so i can't guarantee that any particular one won't be. some of them won't be but i simply don't know which ones

7.4.22  6:28 pm   do you read the fortune from inside a fortune cookie before eating the cookie, or the other way around

      can i write the fortune

7.4.22  5:06 pm   does the airport terminal cure depression

      often yes

7.4.22  4:33 pm   why does the dog pilot in "how to win at spelling" spell the word "god" but then backtrack to spell the word "good"?

      too intense probably

7.4.22  4:28 pm   are you currently sitting or standing?

      jogging

7.4.22  12:36 pm   is salt lake city actually full of salt?

      the lake is

7.4.22  11:41 am   what are the best ingredients for a salad?

      how about a leaf

7.4.22  2:52 am   Can you make 'orange' rhyme with 'banana'?

      i think so

7.4.22  1:07 am   What is life?

      you, etc

7.3.22  11:31 pm   How to be bold

      start telling the truth about whether or not you exist

7.3.22  11:03 pm   What's your opinion on the public?

      it's pretty good

7.3.22  10:42 pm   what would be the approximate radius of drum noise if the drum room was soundproofed? 

      the same as the room

7.3.22  9:58 pm   What is your favorite language?

      time

7.3.22  8:37 pm   how do i conquer France

      you could hide in a croissant and then jump out

7.3.22  3:33 pm   In the Here Comes the Sun video, at "shining on everyone", you are tickling the air with your fingers, can you explain?

      i was illustrating the sun rays trickling down

7.3.22  1:29 pm   i have to do homework. what do you think of homework?

      it's more popular now than ever

7.3.22  12:29 pm   do you imagine things happening while songs are playing

      sometimes

7.3.22  8:39 am   did you write any songs in 2020

      i finished writing "here comes the sun".
      i started writing "special sandals (fly around)", "more than a dream", and 18 others.
      i came up with the title from "ground plane(s)".
      i also worked on the writing for 33 others

7.3.22  5:10 am   i'm addicted to the harmonic minor. help.

      try phrygian natural 3

7.3.22  4:54 am   how do you do art without getting demoralized when you see that everyone is better than you?

      everyone is better than all those people too

7.3.22  2:33 am   Do you still remember all the lyrics of all your songs?

      no but they are written down and also posted online

7.3.22  2:15 am   What do you want to learn how to do

      ronk and roll

7.3.22  2:08 am   are you succeeding in making your next song your new favorite?

      yes but i'm not out of the woods yet

7.3.22  1:55 am   is living worth life?

      let me perform some calculations

7.3.22  12:53 am   What's the meaning of fly around 

      i'm not sure if i could put it into words. at least not without putting those words to music as well

7.3.22  12:34 am   Are you aware that your music saves people? 

      that would be almost too convenient

7.2.22  11:39 pm   how to stop myself from listening to my own songs over and over and ruining them before they're done

      fuck it, do it live

7.2.22  10:48 pm   do you like mountains

      yes

7.2.22  10:05 pm   Hi bill, do you have any tips on adding chords to a melody? Everytime I try to add chords to a melody I can never get it to sound right, and I generally feel directionless while trying to make them.

      just spend some time looking at the songs you already know. your favorite songs, the songs you've known for your whole life. take a look at them and see what's going on in the notes and chords. like language, you'll pick it up automatically, although it will take some time. just think of how long it took to learn english. it may take that long but it will be just as easy

7.2.22  8:15 pm   in your website there is a bench photo, and around 5 yer\ars later, you made a jingle about a bench, did the bench photo inspire the photo?

or is it something else?

     the bench photo is the photo. the bench inspired the bench photo

7.2.22  7:50 pm   how to stop myself from listening to the same songs over and over again and ruining them

      you'll have to make your own songs now

7.2.22  7:26 pm   what do you do when you're not making music

      make a video to go with the music

7.2.22  6:42 pm   Hey, Bill, what's the best thing about games?

      when it's a tie

7.2.22  5:41 pm   do you respect owl pictures? this may sound weird but its really important. 

      yes

7.2.22  4:30 pm   happy belated canada day

      thank you, it's about time

7.2.22  3:16 pm   am i too old for lego?

      you are the exact recommended age
